resources.string: There is a new version available, do you want to update now?

Before using this application, you should know that when you log in , we automatically save your account information on the official application website, and this information may be includes email, phone number, name... of your account.
 This information is collect for the following reasons:
 1- When you write any inappropriate words and phrases in the conversations screen, we use your account to block it and prevent you from chatting again.
 2- Any information collected from your account is for display in the Conversations screen..
 3 - Your account is also save with us in order to facilitate communication with us in solving any problem.
 4- The account may also be used to manage in-app advertisements and prevent invalid activities from the user.
 
 Be aware that this collected information is held securely within the site.

To be allowed to chat, you must comply with some conditions:
 1- It is strictly forbidden to write inappropriate or indecent words or phrases.
 2- If the chat screen supports sending pictures, it is strictly forbidden to send indecent images (which suggest sexual connotations, drugs, etc.). 

Any violation of these terms will result in your account being banned, and you will be banned from chatting permanently.
